"Oh, <%me>!<br>How unexpected to meet<br:
"I've occasionally heard from
Claris Claes, but it's different
when we meet like this. You got
a genuine feeling."

"Nothing in particular, just one of
those periodic strolls in Naberius!"

"I ended up in command of the Combat
Unit, but all of that doesn't matter!
This is supremacy in the action!"

"Think for a moment! If I had
no will to continue, how
awkward that would have been?!"

"You called it Earth? Because of our response
to that planet in another dimension, our
response elsewhere in our own dimension,
has become insufficient."

"Thus Claris Claes and Myself,
go around patrolling whenever
we're free!"

"I understand the issues that are
happening on Earth, but we ARKS
have lingering Darker problems!"

"This is no way about what we should
prioritize. This is about being the
right person in the right place."

"We're here, <%me> is there.
When required, we help each other."

"That's why I feel reassured and
happy about your return!"

"Eh, what...?! Somewhere, a
voice calls for my help!
<%me>! Until next time!"
